articles.author: Liam Doolan
articles.title: Xenoblade Chronicles 3 Collector's Edition Goodies To Ship At A "Later Date" (Europe) - Nintendo Life
articles.description: It might be a similar rollout in North America
articles.content:
Image: Nintendo
We've got an update for the European Xenoblade fans out there. According to Nintendo UK's official website, the extra contents of the Xenoblade Chronicles 3 Collector's Edition won't… [+1702 chars]
